channel.title: Adding "New Player Message"

item.title: Adding "New Player Message"
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Wouldn’t you just loop all the active players and send a message to em all?
I don’t know how a 508 works or what it’s variables are like, but it’d be similar to:

for(Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { if(!p.getPlayerName().equalsIgnoreCase(player.getPlayerName())) p.getActionSender().sendMessage("Player: " + player.getPlayerName() + " has just joined the server"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Adding "New Player Message"
item.dc:creator: @dillo1000 dillo1000
item.description:
@dillo1000 wrote:

Okay I’m a bit puzzled with adding a new player message to everyone on a 508. I am learning Java in College so I thought I’d ask you guys, it really helps me learn

My Cutscreen where the player gets there starter items is here

            public void stop() {
                super.stop();
                player.removeAttribute("cutsceneAction");
                ActionSender.resetCamera(player);
                player.removeAttribute("cantMove");
                if(!player.hasStarter()){
					player.setHasStarter(true);
					player.getInventory().addItem(995, 1000000);
					player.getInventory().addItem(841, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(882, 100);
					player.getInventory().addItem(1129, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(1095, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(579, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(577, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(1011, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(1381, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(558, 100);
					player.getInventory().addItem(1323, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(1153, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(1115, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(1067, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(1191, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(1712, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(386, 1000);
					player.getInventory().addItem(15273, 250);
                	player.getInventory().refresh();
                }
            }

        });
    }

Read full topic
